tweets.text: More raw sewage, pouring into yet another of our lovely rivers. Why do we put up with this? https://t.co/IckIgM2G0X

@KerrieDoodles @kiergroup @EnvAgency It‚Äôs very sad. Always particularly sad to think it‚Äôs often migrant birds that have flown back from Africa to nest here. There‚Äôs such a level of trust on their part, and they are met with that.

@HelenVi00175623 @MrMarkwarren1 @maricaoneill @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Of course not, whether it be your heart or anxiety neither are acceptable and you don‚Äôt deserve to be poisoned in your own home. We stand together üí™ @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice Sort this üí© show out! @Cap_it_off #stopthestink

Wall of landfill gas as I opened my front door to leave for work after thinking the wind gods had blown in our favour last https://t.co/6kycVLIsKx the time I got to the car needed to use my inhaler&it‚Äôs knocked me sick as I start a 10 hour day at work @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/cKaJ2yNyxw

@HelenVi00175623 @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency That's atrocious üòî Thankfully, the odour didn't get into the house last night so I was able to sleep for once. However, that means other people had to suffer the smell so there's no peace of mind. I hope you were able to escape it and get some rest. Take care xx

@a_merrydew @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It really is exhausting and I think I can count on one hand the hours sleep I've had since Friday üò¢ it really has to stop before something tragic happens. I hope you're feeling better now Aimee you have had a rough time with it too ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèxx
@HelenVi00175623 @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency It's terrible, exhausting, and completely unacceptable üòî I hope you're able to get at least some sleep tonight üôè‚ù§Ô∏è
@SarahInNUL @LoneRanger77777 @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @Cap_it_off Well said Sarah. @BorisJohnson we need your help. #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe

Thank you @talkRADIO The host seemed genuinely shocked about how we are living. It is shocking and should not be tolerated in this day and age!
